DOC.brief_summary: A Double Blind, Placebo-Controlled Randomized Study to Compare the Safety and Tolerability of GTS-21 (25 Mg TID, 50 Mg TID, 75 Mg TID and 150 Mg TID) When Administered Daily for 28 Days to Participants With Probable Alzheimer’s Disease
DOC.brief_title: GTS21-201 for Alzheimer Disease:GTS-21 Administered Daily for 28 Days to Participants With Probable Alzheimer’s Disease
DOC.detailed_description: A Double Blind, Placebo-Controlled Randomized Study to Compare the Safety and Tolerability of GTS-21 (25 Mg TID, 50 Mg TID, 75 Mg TID and 150 Mg TID) When Administered Daily for 28 Days to Participants With Probable Alzheimer’s Disease
